user.title: GoTo SMS Configuration
user.description: Enter your GoTo Connect OAuth2 credentials to enable SMS functionality.

oauth.title: OAuth2 Authorization
oauth.description:
Click or copy this URL to authorize:

{auth_url}

After authorization, copy the full redirect URL (it will look like: https://home-assistant.io/auth/callback?code=...) and paste it in the field below.

If you only get a code, you can paste just the code.

reauth_oauth.title: Re-authentication Required
reauth_oauth.description:
Your GoTo SMS integration needs to be re-authenticated.

Click or copy this URL to authorize:

{auth_url}

After authorization, copy the full redirect URL (it will look like: https://home-assistant.io/auth/callback?code=...) and paste it in the field below.

If you only get a code, you can paste just the code.
